publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1994 Hugh O’Donnell: Paralympic Pre-Games Training Camps—That the Parliament congratulates Grangemouth Stadium and National Indoor Athletics Academy and Wishaw Sports Centre on their selection as pre-competition training centres for the Paralympic Games and their inclusion in the guide which will be presented to national paralympic committees (NPCs) in Beijing; recognises that the facilities were selected after a rigorous evaluation against selection criteria in close co-operation with sporting bodies including the British Paralympic Association, and encourages both Falkirk and North Lanarkshire councils to use their best efforts to promote the facilities to competing athletes.
S3M-1994 Paralympic Pre-Games Training Camps (lodged on 27 May 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, Patricia Ferguson*
